title: Cyborg 009: Kaijuu Sensou (Cyborg 009 and the Monster Wars)
synopsis: The evil organization 'Black Ghost' attacked around the world, using dinosaur (plesiosaur) type giant robots, and the team of 9 cyborgs launched their quest for the Black Ghost's hideout. 009 meets a girl named Helena...
